title: 49 40b41a 49 "Roguetown" / "Switched Blades""Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro’s New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!"Transliteration: "Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintō to Josōchō" (Japanese:三代鬼徹と雪走!ゾロの新刀と女曹長) Yoshihiro Ueda Michiru Shimada 515.7 November 22, 2000(2000-11-22)[84] July 2, 2005
transformers_text: 49 40 b 41 a 49 Rogue town Switched Blades Kite tsu III and Yu bashir i Zoro s New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major Transliteration S and a i Kite tsu to Yu bashir i Zoro no S hint to Jos ch Japanese Yoshihiro Ueda Michiru Shimada 515 7 November 22 2000 2000 11 22 84 July 2 2005 While searching for new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mi hawk Zoro meets a woman named T as hig i a marine Sergeant Major with a passion for swords who looks exactly like an older Kuina She notices that Zoro is carrying a rare sword Zoro who has little money inquires about a cheap sword which the owner says is cursed After an impressive test of the sword the owner lets him have it for free along with another rare sword he said should belong to a true swordsman
